did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Dept. of Consumer Economics and Housing records, 1969-1997.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.Dept. of Consumer Economics and Housing.

did.physdesc: Reading lists, annual reports, list of theses, department meeting minutes, master plan, photographs, and Five Year Review and correspondence
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reading lists, annual reports, list of theses from 1926-1990, department meeting minutes, master plan, and Five Year Review and correspondence.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1997, merged with Dept. of Human Service Studies to become Dept. of Policy Analysis and Management.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reading lists, annual reports, list of theses from 1926-1990, department meeting minutes, master plan, and Five Year Review and correspondence.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Dept. of Consumer Economics and Housing records, #23-23-2864. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
See also Dept.of Human Service Studies #23-24-2894
See also Dept. of Policy Analysis and Management records #23-26-3006

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Correspondence
Box 2- Folder 55, Box 5- Folders 3-4, 6, 11-12

A. Course Outlines/ Reading Lists
Box 1- Folders 18-45, Box 2- Folders 46-54

B. Intro Economics Course
Box 5- Folders 9-10

A. "The Committee" & Executive Committee
Box 5- Folder 5

C. Faculty Meetings
Box 1- Folders 10-17, Box 5- Folders 13-16

Series V. Publications
Box 5- Folder 18-19, Box7- Folders 1-5

A. Annual
Box 1- Folder 7-9, Box 3, Box 5- Folder 1-2

B. Five Year Plans
Box 1- Folder 2

E. Chair's Reports to the Dean
Box 1, Folder 46

F. Various other Reports
Box 1, Folder 49

Series VII. Subject Files
Box 1- Folders 1, 4-6, 47, 50 Box 2- Folders 56-61
